channel.title: Halo 3
channel.description:
Took over my life. That tis why i have been gone (WOOHOO! said exe626) When i was gone. Now i need to re-register my graphics card.
anyways, to cut the crap...
Halo 3, do you like it or not, i mean did you get addicted to it ever?

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

I finished the game on legendary. Then my xbox broke. Then I got assassins creed for ps3 which is way better btw along with kane and lynch and mass effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

It’s good, but the build up ruined it. I was bored of it in 10 days or less… Unfortunately Halo 3 didn’t meet much people’s expectations, and that’s why it fails so much.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @Steam_zer0 Steam_zer0
item.description:
@Steam_zer0 wrote:

I hated the grunt that keep running me over with the ghost, btw the infection mode is the best mode ever, cuz i got ton of freind and i go to my friend house and he is alway hosting halo party and we all play infection all day long,(One of my freind know where the zombie reswapn so he shoot all of my friend and me again(he got ton of achivement for this)

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

Probbly the most boring game after time… i got to lvl 40 and you pretty much loose levels… ill stick with gow

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:37, topic:157659”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=214942.msg1908607#msg1908607 date=1196556071]
And what does that mean?I never said you had to play halo much to get a 40…I have played 45games on my other account and am a 39 already.
[/quote]

It’s easier if you play with high levels from the beginning. When I started, I played with normal matchmaking alone, and won maybe half my games. Then I paired up with a 30, and went up like crazy in levels and won basically every game.[/quote]

Not necessarily,I played with a buddy who was a 45 and I was 30 and we won but I would always come 2nd or third on the team and didnt rank up much…But now if I am a rank 15(new account) played with 40s and get mvp and such I usaully double rank if we win.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

frost21:

And what does that mean?I never said you had to play halo much to get a 40…I have played 45games on my other account and am a 39 already.

It’s easier if you play with high levels from the beginning. When I started, I played with normal matchmaking alone, and won maybe half my games. Then I paired up with a 30, and went up like crazy in levels and won basically every game.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:28, topic:157659”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=214942.msg1907292#msg1907292 date=1196489335]

i had the samuria sword on it, but my xbox got fucked now im restarting the campaign tonight with some friends, if you with to add me, add “IIl Tom III”, and yeah it kicks ass. Im going to get Cod4 soon mabe tomorow

cod4?

Call of duty 4,and zammy if your good we can do double team together I am a 44,only if your actually as good as you say.I am pretty above average myself.
[/quote]
im lvl 40 in halo 3, i don’t play much.[/quote]

And what does that mean?I never said you had to play halo much to get a 40…I have played 45games on my other account and am a 39 already.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

fellixombc:

tbh, halo was orignally created for macs, if you read halo articales in gamepro magazine.

If it was originally created for Macs, I would love it all the more.

swami 8333:

sucked. why? because master chief dies at the end but if you beat legends mode he does’t die at the end. the game is like 54.68%/100.00% good.

Wrong, dipshit. He doesn’t die in any version you play it in. I’ve read your other posts and they were the most judgmental and pretentious pieces of shit ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:32, topic:157659”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=214942.msg1907642#msg1907642 date=1196503978]
never got addicted to it… halo is ok… honestly it is not the greatest game i have ever played… halo one is so far my favorite of all of them… dont know why but it is…
[/quote]
Yeh, agree’d. Halo 1 was the best.
I finished Halo 3 the other day. Went to a friends and played 8 hours straight. It was pretty good.

Halo is my favorite game, no doubt.
Suck on that, Sony.[/quote]
i luv you xD

tbh, halo was orignally created for macs, if you read halo articales in gamepro magazine.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:17, topic:157659”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=214942.msg1879909#msg1879909 date=1194937078]

owned?
http://www.bungie.net/stats/halo3/CareerStats.aspx?player=kcaj926%20%20%20%20%20%20&social=false&map=0

Who is that, and could you explain to me how exactly I am owned?
[/quote]
tat is me and i have more awards ten u.
and tbh, i played as kcaj926[1] (cuz my bro has to be normal(not temp profile)) and on that temp acc i have gotten 4 over kills and 1 killtackular but i have no proof of it :([/quote]

How is that owned?Proves nothing,could just mean you killsteal,and such…My buddy has like twice your ratio so should I just say owned?

I probably could beat you or give you a good fight even if your ratio is higher than mine.

Read full topic
